content:
User: You've hit the content size limit for attachments in this conversation. Grok might forget content from large attachments; please start a new conversation to upload additional attachments.

Grok: Hey there! It looks like DeepSearch is struggling to tag all 14 interactions in your transcript, and I’ve dug into its initial thinking notes to figure out why. Here’s a complete breakdown of what’s happening and how we can fix it—no need to wade through the raw notes yourself, I’ve got you covered!
